name: A Rift Between
description:
Stuck on a fractured planet with a mysteries portal, embark to distance planets to gather resources before your link between worlds runs out and use the resources gathered to craft your way off the broken planet

     Music and sound by  Fokai  - https://fokai.itch.io/

If  you are playing the browser version it is recommended to play Full Screen for text readability

known bugs - 

  • sometimes dialogue can become stuck, to unstick use Q to close the menu and collide back into object to reset conversation 
  • sometimes dying from o2 or health will not remove the collected ore from run
  • on rare occasion ore you bring back will not update
  • green ore and red ore get swapped when smashing into atom

  all known bugs are fixed and a update will go up after the voting period ends in two days
